item.title: For Fans By Fans: Digital Stars Fan Forge Challenge Begins!
item.dc:creator: nate
item.description:

The post For Fans By Fans: Digital Stars Fan Forge Challenge Begins! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Hello vocalsynth fans! We are thrilled to announce once more the opportunity for you to flex your artistic muscles with the newest Fan Forge challenge hosted by For Fans By Fans! For those who are new to Fan Forge, it is an open gallery where artists submit their fan art to get the chance to become official licensed products. Selected artwork will earn a commission rate per item sold on the For Fans By Fans website, through wholesale, and at conventions!

Guidelines

You need to be 18 years or older, or have parental or guardian consent in order to enter into the challenge.
Submissions are open internationally!

All you need to do is design something original, creative, and inspired by any of the Piapro characters! This includes Hatsune Miku, Kagamine Rin, Kagamine Len, Megurine Luka, KAITO, and MEIKO.

No overtly sexual designs are allowed, and use of other costumes created by other artists is not permitted.

Prizes

Grand Prize Winner (x1): A Hatsune Miku Magical Mirai 2020 Nendoroid, $500 cash, and DX Gift Pack courtesy of Crypton Future Media

Runner-Up Prize Winners (x2): $250 cash prize, and Gift Pack courtesy of Crypton Future Media

We wish the absolute best of luck to everyone who enters! You can check out the promotion website for more details and to submit your design, located here.

The post For Fans By Fans: Digital Stars Fan Forge Challenge Begins! appeared first on VNN.
